title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 28 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 28 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Those with the woke virus infecting elite medical schools get upset when medical doctors say "woman" when referring to a female who is pregnant. Stupid and crazy and partly because professors are afraid of their woke students. The woke left has broken science. Liberal mantra: Words are violence. Wokeness is the open rejection of truth of the most basic and fundamental kind. And medical schools are bending the knee to this. Schumer is upset that Republicans are actually pushing back against $4.1 trillion "infrastructure" spending bill. When Republicans stand up it's "obstruction"; when Democrats do that it's "glorious democracy."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
